findings.message:

	External calls:
	- tokenSaleContract.claim(_buyer,pendingTokenUser[_buyer]) (RC.sol#328-330)

	External calls sending eth:
	- tokenSaleContract.wallet().transfer(etherUser[_buyer]) (RC.sol#332-333)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- etherUser (RC.sol#333)
